涳字的基本解释

涳
kōng
〔涳濛〕古同“空蒙”，（细雨）迷茫，如“水光潋滟晴方好，山色涳涳雨亦奇。”
直流。

涳
náng
姓。

涳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kōng］
［《廣韻》苦紅切，平東，溪。］
见“涳濛”。

涳字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涳； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页628第07
【廣韻】苦紅切【集韻】枯公切，?音空。【說文】直流也。一曰空濛，細雨。　又【廣韻】口江切【集韻】枯江切，?音腔。又【廣韻】女江切【集韻】農江切，?音?。義?同。　又【集韻】苦貢切，音控亦直流也。

涳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
涳字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Long
kōng
〔Jianmeng〕 In ancient times, the same "empty and misty", (drizzle) was confused, such as "the water is shining and sunny, and the mountains are also peculiar with lingering rain."
DC.
Long
náng
name.
Long
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kōng］
["Guangyun" bitter red cut, Pingdong, Xi. ]
See "Lianmeng".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　涳; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 628 to 07
[Guang Yun] bitter red cut [Ji Yun] dry public cut, sound empty. [Said the text] DC also. One said empty and drizzle.　[Guangyun] Koujiangqi [Jiyun] Kujiangqi,? Sound cavity. And [Guang Yun] Female Jiang Qi [Ji Yun] Nong Jiang Qi, "Yin". Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] bitter tribute cutting, the sound control is also direct.
